page.title: 12ENTERTAINMENT IN EDDERTON
page.content: There are lots of entertaining things to do in Edderton.The{pub}which is part of the hotel is where lots of people go and buy a drink and meet friends.It is usually quiet during the week but gets very busy at week ends.Every Saturday night two musicians come to the hotel and play dance music.Many people come over to the hotel to have{a meal,a dance and {a few drinks.The hall}which is very old and about to be replaced is a place where people can have fun.There are{concerts}every year featuring the children and local artistes.The school uses it as a small{games hall.}In the winter time there is a{youth club which meets weekly for the twelve to eighteen year olds. Occasionally there is a{disco}for the young people.There is also an annual{sale of work and {fete}to raise money for the village.
